name: Fungipunk 3077
description:
Description:

It’s 3077. After the global catastrophe, a research team comes back to Earth to get samples of biosphere. 

Upon arrival they discover that the Earth has been covered with mushrooms. 

Dr. Ivan was teleported into a cave. He needs to collect all samples and find an exit. 

Peculiarities:

> New fantastic 1-bit style;

> Original level design;

> New original music and sound effects created by me;

> Added new scripts (typewrite effect, fade-in effect) and modified given scripts.

Credits:

Created by Roman E.

Special thanks: Ann Gry.
